name: NeonArk
description:
ALSO ON NEWGROUNDS: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/801063

An intimidating force from the one and only, Tricky the Clown, forced Dune and Chrome of the A.M.U. to exit every living being on the island to try and fight off the clown. They forgot that the member they abandoned, Apollo, who knows more than the island citizens, was on the moon. Which is where the citizens of the island were sent. This may not be good for the fate of reality. Join the discord server: https://discord.gg/uqEWyAFmdV

NeonArk is a fighting game. You go against 99 other enemies, kind of like a battle royale. It has a storyline, an always changing island, 47 characters (at the moment) with unique backstories, and a battle pass for FREEEEEE!!!!

ALL REDEEMABLE CODES (at the moment):

season2, season3, season4, season5, season6, season7, c2s1, c2s2, c2s3, c2s4.

Skins like Doom Slayer, Patrick, Corrupted Neo, Honor, Apple, Chaos, Damose, Psycho, and more will be available to redeem in season 6.
